mainHero.title: Retro//vrs
mainHero.subtitle: Imperfection shapes identity
mainHero.description: A phygital marketplace for pre-owned luxury goods with an embedded blockchain secured authentication service that protects customers and sellers against counterfeit sales.

items.title: Retro//fit: 3D Capture
items.description: Turn photos of your luxury goods from your phone into high‑quality 3D digital twins that are optimized for AR. It uses photogrammetry to turn a series of pictures taken on your phone into 3D model.

items.title: Retro//twin: Digital certificate
items.description: The authenticity certificate of the luxury good is in a form of 3D digital twin. It is attached to object itself, not to an event, a paper or a chip. It enables digital traceability of the authenticated luxury goods

items.name: Photogrammetry
items.description: Turn photos from your phone into high‑quality 3D models that are optimized for AR. What is needed is a series of well-lit photographs taken from many different angles. It analyzes the overlap area between different images to match up landmarks, and then produces a 3D model of the photographed object.

items.name: Peer verification
items.description: Digital Twin enables authentication to be done by peer verification from Retrovrs’ network of experts with transparent process. We provide 3 layers of verifications to ensure the accuracy of the authentication process

items.name: Cross-chain
items.description: Blockchain interactions require gas fees which suggests that it can become quite expensive to operate a metaverse platform. A cross-chain is the interoperability between two relatively independent blockchains. In other words, it allows blockchains to speak to one another because they’re built in a standardized way. This interoperability allows the high volume transactions to be handled in low/zero gas fee chain.

items.name: Metaverse
items.description: In the simplest of nutshells, the metaverse is "a whole new 3D interactive internet". The emergence of the metaverse offers incredible potential for fashion and luxury industry. As fashion immerses itself in the metaverse, it can be separated into two forms: the combination of physical and digital, where clothing can be worn using augmented or virtual realities, and fully digital, where items are sold directly to an avatar.

testflight.title: Retro//crowd
testflight.description: Mobile App to 3D scan second hand luxury goods and share it to the community to check if the item is legit. The goal is to build community and brand while at the same time gathering 3D models data for our R&D on Phygital Authentication Service
